## Border with text

### PropTypes

| propName | propType | defaultValue | isRequired | options/example |
|----------|----------|--------------|------------|---------|
| textStyle     | object   | -      | +          | style for text |
| style | object   |-           |   -       |  |
| children | node | -            | +          |  |



### Example

``` js
<BorderWithText >
  BorderWithText
</BorderWithText>
```
